data.name: S.I.N. Unit - Farmhouse Map DLC
data.detailed_description:
A brand new map. A Farmhouse, old creepy and haunted!

Features.


  • A medium sized house in the middle of nowhere.
  • Several rooms. The Entity can be in any of them!
  • A basement with some cool things there.
  • A second floor.
  • Only the host has to own the DLC for everyone in the lobby to play on this map.

  • Storage: 1 GB available space
